scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && tsc && mv dist/out-tsc/src/lit dist/out-tsc/lit  && mv dist/out-tsc/src/angular dist/out-tsc/angular && mv dist/out-tsc/src/react dist/out-tsc/react
scripts.build:angular-example: cd examples/angular/pokemon-catalog && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:react-example: cd examples/react/pokemon-catalog && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:lit-example: cd examples/lit/pokemon-catalog && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:angular-example && npm run build:react-example && npm run build:lit-example
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:angular-example && npm run test:react-example && npm run test:lit-example
scripts.validate:examples: npm run validate:angular-example && npm run validate:react-example && npm run validate:lit-example
scripts.e2e:examples: npm run e2e:angular-example && npm run e2e:react-example && npm run e2e:lit-example
scripts.copy-build:examples: npm run copy-build:react-example && npm run copy-build:angular-example && npm run copy-build:lit-example
scripts.predeploy:examples: npm run predeploy:react-example && npm run predeploy:angular-example && npm run predeploy:lit-example
scripts.predeploy: npm run predeploy:examples && npm run copy-build:examples
